schedule.announcement: It's midnight. Another hour begins.
It's 1 o'clock. Time flies, doesn't it?
It's 2 o'clock. Keep marching on!
It's 3 o'clock. Stay focused!
It's 4 o'clock. Keep up the good work!
It's 5 o'clock. Halfway through the day!
It's 6 o'clock. Evening is on the horizon.
It's 7 o'clock. Keep pushing forward!
It's 8 o'clock. Keep the momentum going!
It's 9 o'clock. Stay on track!
It's 10 o'clock. Keep shining bright!
It's 11 o'clock. Almost time for a break!
It's noon. The day is at its peak.
It's 1 o'clock. Keep the energy up!
It's 2 o'clock. Keep pushing through!
It's 3 o'clock. You're doing great!
It's 4 o'clock. Keep up the fantastic work!
It's 5 o'clock. Time to wind down soon!
It's 6 o'clock. Evening is here.
It's 7 o'clock. Keep going strong!
It's 8 o'clock. You're doing amazing!
It's 9 o'clock. Stay determined!
It's 10 o'clock. Keep up the perseverance!
It's 11 o'clock. Keep up the good vibes!
